body:
## 2020 Super Bowl Odds

We're building a slick odds comparison tool while the NFL decides if they can start the 2020 season on time.

<canvas id='g41' name="brgraph" data-file-name="nflodds.json" data-only-names="Kansas City Chiefs,Baltimore Ravens,San Francisco 49ers,New Orleans Saints,Dalls Cowboys,Tampa Bay Buccaneers,Indianapolis Colts,Seattle Seahawks,Philadeplphia Eagles,Pittsburgh Steelers,Buffalo Bills" data-start="2020-01-04 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

## Expert Predictions

We can't see Pat Mahomes' Chiefs getting much bigger. We're tempted to have the favourites onside at +700 to start the season. But we'll hold for now.

The one value pick that stands out are the Seahawks at +2200. We're expecting Russell Wilson and co to go much deeper in the Playoffs this year.
title: 2020 Super Bowl Odds (+ Expert Predictions)
description: 2020 Super Bowl Odds are here for you everyday.
